  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2442</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2442</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Comment se repérer?</string>
            <string language="en">Street directions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Straße Richtungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Directions de rue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sentidos da rua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sensi della via</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατευθύνσεις οδών</string>
          </title>
          <language>fr</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàtica (MUD) interactiva amb eines lingüístiques per demanar i explicar la localització d'un indret i arribar-hi. Conté unes parts de pràctica, amb presentació del lèxic i uns exercicis, i una part d'autoavaluació.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on asking where a place is and how to get there. It includes practice activities, vocabulary, exercises and self-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua estrangera</string>
            <string language="en">foreign language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua extranjera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comunicació oral</string>
            <string language="en">speech communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material didàctic</string>
            <string language="en">teaching materials</string>
            <string language="es">material didáctico</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf dem Bitten, wo ein Platz ist und wie man dort erhält. 
Er schließt Praxisaktivitäten, -wortschatz, -übungen und 
-selbstbewertung ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
demander où un endroit est et comment y arriver. Il inclut des 
activités, le vocabulaire, des exercices et le art de l'auto-portrait-assessment de
pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em pedir 
onde um lugar está e como começar lá. Inclui atividades, 
vocabulário, exercícios e self-assessment da prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sul 
chiedere dove un posto è e come ottenere là. Include le 
attività, il vocabolario, le esercitazioni e la valutazione di se 
stesso di pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στην 
ερώτηση όπου μια θέση είναι και πώς να φθάσει εκεί. 
Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες, το λεξιλόγιο, τις ασκήσεις 
και την αυτοαξιολόγηση πρακτικής.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fremdsprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprechfunkanlage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langue étrangère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission de la parole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matériel didactique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua extrangeira</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uma comunicação de discurso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">materiais de ensino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lingua straniera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">communicazione verbale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">materiali didattici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ξένη γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεκτική επικοινωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαιδευτικά υλικά</string>
          </keyword>
